Title: US midsize banks seek FDIC Insurance on 'all deposits' for 2 years: Report
Description: According to a March 18 Bloomberg report, the Mid-Size Bank Coalition of America (MBCA) has asked regulators to extend insurance on all deposits for the next two years, arguing that it would “immediately halt the exodus” of deposits from smaller banks.

Title: The Jobs Report, Vail's Hiring Plans, the Lipstick Effect, and More
Description: Plus Nell Minow of Value Edge Advisors talks with us about making stock-buyback plans more shareholder friendly and shares some thoughts on ESG guidelines.
